#include <stdio.h>

long int inp()
{
     long int n=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
     while(c<'0'||c>'9')
     c=getchar_unlocked();
     while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
     n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
     return n;
}

int main()
{
    long int m,n,a,t;
    int flag;
    flag=0;
    m=inp();
    n=inp();
    t=(n/2)+(n%2);
    while(m--)
    {
            a=inp();
            if(a<=t)
            continue;
            else
            {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
    }
    if(flag)
    printf("NO\n");
    else
    printf("YES\n");
    return 0;
}
